title: ****9/1 CHESTNUT HILL LARGE STUDIO STEPS TO BC-HEAT, HW INCLD & NO FEE
posting_body: A very spacious, and newly renovated studio, 1 bathroom studio with additional alcove, rental apartment located on Commonwealth Avenue in Chestnut Hill.

The unit is located in a professionally managed building and is very close to the MBTA Green Line, Boston College, Beacon Street/Brookline, and Longwood Medical area  Heat and Hot Water are included in the rent price and there is shared laundry in the building.
No dogs and no undergraduate students.
Please email Ben with any questions or to schedule a viewing of the property!
Bus: 86, Chestnut Hill Ave @ South St (0.28 mi)
Bus: 501, Winship St @ Union St (0.59 mi)
